thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: New York Governor Pushes For Longer Wait Time for Some Gun Purchases

author: Corinne Ramey
title: New York Governor Pushes For Longer Wait Time for Some Gun Purchases

organizations.name: longer wait time for some gun purchases new york

text:
New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo said Tuesday he had introduced legislation to lengthen the waiting period to buy guns for people who aren’t immediately approved by a federal background-check database.
Under current federal law, gun dealers must check a potential buyer’s name in the National Instant Criminal Background Check System before selling a firearm. The system then provides the seller with a notification of “proceed,” “denied” or “delayed.”
...
